{
  "name": "chatbot-ui",
  "version": "1.51.0",
  "private": true,
  "scripts": {
    "build-workspaces": "npm run build --workspaces --if-present",
    "test-workspaces": "npm run build-workspaces && npm run test --workspaces --if-present",
    "chat": "supabase start && npm run db-types && npm run dev",
    "check-updates": "ncu",
    "restart": "supabase stop && npm run chat",
    "login": "supabase login",
    "supabase-start": "supabase start",
    "update": "git pull origin main && npm run db-migrate && npm run db-types",
    "prepare": "husky install",
    "clean": "npm run lint:fix && npm run format:write",
    "predev": "npm run build-workspaces",
    "dev": "NODE_OPTIONS='--inspect' next dev --turbopack",
    "pretest-server": "npm run build-workspaces",
    "test-server": "next dev",
    "prefast": "npm run build-workspaces",
    "fast": "NODE_OPTIONS='--inspect' next dev --turbo",
    "prebuild": "npm run build-workspaces",
    "build": "NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8000 npx next build --experimental-build-mode compile",
    "prestart": "npm run build-workspaces",
    "start": "next start  -H $HOSTNAME",
    "preinspect": "npm run build-workspaces",
    "inspect": "NODE_OPTIONS='--inspect' next dev",
    "lint": "next lint",
    "pregtg": "npm run build-workspaces",
    "gtg": "npm run lint && npm run type-check",
    "lint:fix": "next lint --fix",
    "preanalyze": "npm run build-workspaces",
    "analyze": "ANALYZE=true npm run build",
    "preview": "next build && next start",
    "pretype-check": "npm run build-workspaces",
    "type-check": "tsc --noEmit",
    "format:write": "prettier --write \"{app,components,context,db,e2e,hooks,lib,middleware,shadcn,types}/**/*.{ts,tsx}\" --cache",
    "format:check": "prettier --check \"{app,components,context,db,e2e,hooks,lib,middleware,shadcn,types}**/*.{ts,tsx}\" --cache",
    "db-reset": "supabase db reset && npm run db-types",
    "db-migrate": "supabase migration up && npm run db-types",
    "db-types": "npx supabase gen types typescript --project-id pormnpytirnwefyqrvpo > supabase/types.ts",
    "db-pull": "supabase db remote commit",
    "db-types:remote": "supabase gen types typescript --linked > supabase/types.ts",
    "db-push": "supabase db push",
    "tickets": "scripts/fetch-tickets.sh",
    "pretest": "npm run test-workspaces",
    "test": "npx jest",
    "pretest:watch": "npm run test-workspaces",
    "test:watch": "npm run test -- --watch",
    "pretest:coverage": "npm run test-workspaces",
    "test:coverage": "npm run test -- --coverage",
    "pretest:coverage:watch": "npm run test-workspaces",
    "test:coverage:watch": "npm run test:coverage -- --watch",
    "test:e2e": "playwright test",
    "compile": "tsc",
    "fix": "gts fix",
    "postinstall": "patch-package"
  },

I see the issue! You have Git configured to use GPG signing (`commit.gpgsign=true`) but your `user.signingkey` is set to an SSH key (`/Users/luke/.ssh/id_ed25519.pub`) instead of your GPG key. This mismatch is likely causing the verification issues.

content.text:
You have two options to fix this:

## Option 1: Use SSH signing (Simpler)
Since you already have SSH keys and `gpg.format=ssh` is set, update your signing key to use the private SSH key:

input.description: Update signing key to use SSH private key

content.text:
## Option 2: Use GPG signing (More traditional)
If you prefer GPG signing, update the configuration to use your GPG key:

```bash
# Set format back to GPG
git config --global gpg.format gpg
# Use your GPG key ID
git config --global user.signingkey DFA0451B7B713F49
```

## To fix the verification:

1. **For SSH signing**: Make sure your SSH public key (`ssh-ed25519 AAAAC3NzaC1lZDI1NTE5AAAAIOR5Y5z8j2Vi8r408ytjSEU1aXCekHd/lKxsX7fopgKL`) is added to your GitHub account as a **Signing Key** (not just an authentication key)

2. Go to GitHub → Settings → SSH and GPG keys → New SSH key → Key type: "Signing Key"

The issue was that you were trying to sign with GPG format but using an SSH key path that pointed to a public key instead of the private key. I've fixed the configuration to use the correct SSH private key path.

Try making a test commit now and it should show as verified!
